linting.command: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_issue_2828.py

fix_summary.problem: from_dict accepts non-string values (dict, list, int, float) for created_at/updated_at fields, using str() coercion which can produce unexpected values like 'dict' or '[1, 2, 3]'
fix_summary.solution: Added explicit type validation for created_at and updated_at fields, accepting only str or None types, rejecting dict, list, int, float, and other incompatible types

risks: Existing data with integer timestamps (e.g., Unix timestamps stored as numbers) will now be rejected - should be stored as strings instead
Behavior change: previously str() coercion would convert anything to string, now strict validation may break edge cases
